message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I believe will be very valuable to you. I'm asking for $12,000 for it. Let me know what you think!
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  $12,000 is a bit higher than I'd like to go at this point. I'm willing to pay $10,500 for it.  Let me know what you think.

Bob, thanks for your counteroffer. I appreciate your interest. I'm willing to come down a bit to $11,500. This is still a fair price considering the value of the product. Let's see if we can find common ground.
